content.rendered:
Written by Vikram Bhatt. Esha Desai. Tanya Pathak

Cast Zareen Khan (Rose (as Zarine Khan)). Karan Kundrra (Ayush (as Karan Kundra)). Vikram Bhatt (Mr. Wadia). Angela Krislinzki (Mehar Wadia / Dina shaw (as Angela Cliff Krislinzki)). Nidhi Chitrakar (Nafisa). Aradhya Taing (Vasudha). Neil Broome (Caretaker – Mr. Jenkins). Rachel Shaw (Maid – Emma). David Turner (Professor Christopher Arkin). Wayne McAulay (Piano Teacher). Jazz Gee (Ayush Father – Mr. Astana). Toby Hinson (English Gentleman Mr. Brett). Shane Harper (British Soldier (Ghost)). Michael Edwards (Richard). Grace Hendy (Julia Richard’s Wife). Chris Orton (Gas Station Man Jim). Alex Dalton (Police). Ian Ray-White (Doctor (as Ian White)). Neil Hurst (Doctor). Lee Poyner (Doctor). Pam Hilton (Librarian). Gareth James (Carriage Man). Tim Wild (Inn Housekeeper Sebastian). Jowanna Rose (Motel Housekeeper). Michael Windross (Newspaper Boy). Sonnia Armstrong (Lily Lopez). Kevin Matthews (Immigration Officer). Anna Dawson (Ghost). Michael Walker (Police Constable). Rob Gawthorpe (Hospital Night Watchman). Sara Banister (Nurse). Francesca Rosado (Nurse). Sarah Poyner (Nurse). Phoebe Cooper (Little Girl). Kenneth Birch (Bell Boy). Manjit Singh (Anthony / Man in Opera Crowd). Farida Mughal Singh (Homeless Lady). Mark Hugh-Williams (Doctor (as Mark Williams)). John Swindel (Doctor). Lisa Juster (Nurse). Darryl Bradford (Bearded English Gentleman). Manoj Anand (Bombay Sophisticated Indian Guest). Joshua Gill (Bombay Sophisticated Indian Guest). Anna Weston (Bombay Sophisticated Indian Guest). Parrgash Kaur (Bombay Sophisticated Indian Guest). Paul Edward Davies (Bombay Sophisticated Bearded Guest). Jess Kaur (Bombay Sophisticated Indian Guest). Bobby Mahmi (Bombay Sophisticated Indian Guest). Kamran Khan (Bombay Sophisticated Indian Guest). Saara Nawaz (Bombay Sophisticated Indian Guest). Mandeep Sehmi (Bombay Sophisticated Indian Guest). Jagdish Shukla (Bombay Sophisticated Indian Guest). Dave Wilson (Sophisticated English Guest). Rita McDonald Damper (Engagement Party Guest). Peter Jay (Posh English Party Guests). Andi Hodgetts (Speaking English Guest). Jane Hamer (Sophisticated Party Guest). Frank Saul (Posh English Party Guests). Ren Vassilliou (Sophisticated English Guest). Gillian Vassilliou (Sophisticated English Guest). Sharon Ward (Hotel Guest at Table). Linda E Greenwood (Opera guest). Kellyann Summers (Posh Engagement Party Guest (as Kellyann Mitchell)). Hugh O’Brien (Engagement Party Guest). Sarah Pitts (Hospital Staff). David Charles-Cully (Passerby (uncredited)). Jason Redshaw (Passerby (uncredited)) . Anne Bryson (Mother of sick child). Janet Cowl (Party guest). Grant Crookes (Various). Akhtar Hussain (Bombay Sophisticated Indian Guest). Joanne James (Nurse (Speaking Role)). Lucy Jepson (Engagement party guest (credit only)). Rayn Khan (Bombay Sophisticated Guest Couple). Harsha Morarji (Bombay Sophisticated Guest Couple). Umair Patel (Musical Artist (archive sound)). Stephen Seal (Rich Englishman). Stephen Mckay (Party guest (uncredited))

Languages Hindi. English. Urdu

Producers Jason Ash. Vikram Bhatt. Vikrant Chopra. Rohit KaduDeshmukh. Mohaan Nadaar. Dharmendra Rawal

Production DMP Film. Loneranger Production. Motion Picture Capital
